description: Close up on Bob's hands, holding the book open, the pages showing a big image of an alien.
text: Bob: Let me show you this alien!

description: Close up on the cat's face, with big eyes and curious expression, looking at the image in the book.
Back to the wide view, Bob is holding the books with two hands, in front of the sitting cat that seems very interested in the image in the book.
text:
Bob: It's from another planet!
Cat: (thinking) Fascinating!

description: Close up on the cat's face again, now with its tongue out and eyes closed, seemingly lost in thought.
text: Cat: (thinking) I wonder if they have catnip on that planet...

description: The cat is now standing on its hind legs and has its paws on the table, looking at Bob with big, pleading eyes.
text:
Cat: Can we go there? Please?
Bob: (laughing) We'll see about that!
